author: Victor Bergeron A.K.A Trader Vic
description: In his book Vic prefaces this cocktail with the comment, "Nice, easy drink". It's basically a lemon Daiquiri with gin and grenadine.
name: Huapala
recipeIngredient: 22.5 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
10 ml Chilled water (omit if wet ice)
2 Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water) (optional)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
